ComicInfo.Title: The Grim After Part 1 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC!
INTRODUCING NEW SERIES ARTIST NIKO HENRICHON.
Essen Breaker is tired of violence. He's traveled to Haas Haaden, the city at the edge of the world, to escape it. But where Breaker goes, death follows. Join writer JUSTIN JORDAN and new series artist NIKO HENRICHON (Pride of Baghdad) for the start of a brand-new story arc, featuring murder, mystery, and lots and lots of blood.
